definition: The civil force of a state, responsible for the prevention and detection of crime and the maintenance of public order.
example: Please call the police.
koChirpScript: police. 경찰 이라는 뜻입니다. 항상 복수 취급합니다. Please call the police. 경찰에 전화해 주세요.

definition: A male police officer.
example: The policeman helped the lost child.
koExample: 그 경찰관은 길 잃은 아이를 도와주었다.
koChirpScript: policeman. 남자 경찰관을 의미합니다. The policeman helped the lost child. 그 경찰관은 길 잃은 아이를 도와주었다.

definition: A small area of still water, typically one that has been artificially created.
example: Let's go for a swim in the pool.
koChirpScript: pool. 수영장 이라는 뜻입니다. Let's go for a swim in the pool. 수영장에서 수영하러 가자.

definition: Lacking sufficient money to live at a standard considered comfortable or normal in a society.
example: He is too poor to buy a car.
koExample: 그는 너무 가난해서 차를 살 수 없다.
koChirpScript: poor. 가난한 또는 불쌍한 이라는 뜻입니다. He is too poor to buy a car. 그는 너무 가난해서 차를 살 수 없다.

definition: Liked, admired, or enjoyed by many people or by a particular person or group.
example: This is a very popular song.
koChirpScript: popular. 인기 있는 이라는 뜻입니다. This is a very popular song. 이것은 매우 인기 있는 노래이다.

definition: Consisting in or characterized by the presence rather than the absence of distinguishing features.
example: She has a positive attitude.
koChirpScript: positive. 긍정적인 이라는 뜻입니다. She has a positive attitude. 그녀는 긍정적인 태도를 가지고 있다.

definition: Able to be done; within the power or capacity of someone or something.
example: Is it possible to finish this today?
koChirpScript: possible. 가능한 이라는 뜻입니다. Is it possible to finish this today? 오늘 이것을 끝내는 것이 가능한가요?

definition: A long, sturdy piece of timber or metal set upright in the ground and used to support something or as a marker; display (a notice) in a public place.
example: I saw the post on the internet. He posted a letter.
koGloss: n. 우편, 게시물; v. 게시하다, (우편을) 보내다
koExample: 나는 인터넷에서 그 게시물을 봤다. 그는 편지를 부쳤다.
koChirpScript: post. 우편 또는 게시물, 그리고 게시하다 또는 우편을 보내다 라는 뜻입니다. I saw the post on the internet. 나는 인터넷에서 그 게시물을 봤다. He posted a letter. 그는 편지를 부쳤다.

definition: A starchy plant tuber that is one of the most important food crops, cooked and eaten as a vegetable.
example: I like fried potatoes.
koChirpScript: potato. 감자 라는 뜻입니다. 복수형은 potatoes 입니다. I like fried potatoes. 나는 감자튀김을 좋아한다.

definition: The basic monetary unit of the UK, equal to 100 pence.
example: This book costs ten pounds.
koChirpScript: pound. 영국의 화폐 단위 또는 무게 단위인 파운드 라는 뜻입니다. This book costs ten pounds. 이 책은 10파운드이다.

definition: The actual application or use of an idea, belief, or method as opposed to theories about such application or use; perform (an activity) or exercise (a skill) repeatedly or regularly in order to improve or maintain one's proficiency.
example: Practice makes perfect. You need to practice every day.
koExample: 연습이 완벽을 만든다. 매일 연습해야 한다.
koChirpScript: practice. 연습 또는 연습하다 라는 뜻입니다. Practice makes perfect. 연습이 완벽을 만든다. You need to practice every day. 매일 연습해야 한다.

definition: Like (one thing or person) better than another or others; tend to choose.
example: I prefer coffee to tea.
koChirpScript: prefer. 무엇무엇을 더 좋아하다 또는 선호하다 라는 뜻입니다. I prefer coffee to tea. 나는 차보다 커피를 더 좋아한다.

definition: Make (something) ready for use or consideration.
example: I need to prepare for the exam.
koChirpScript: prepare. 준비하다 라는 뜻입니다. I need to prepare for the exam. 나는 시험을 준비해야 한다.

definition: In a particular place; a thing given to someone as a gift.
example: All the students were present. I got a lovely present for my birthday.
koExample: 모든 학생들이 출석했다. 나는 생일 선물로 멋진 선물을 받았다.
koChirpScript: present. 참석한 또는 선물 이라는 뜻입니다. All the students were present. 모든 학생들이 출석했다. I got a lovely present for my birthday. 나는 생일 선물로 멋진 선물을 받았다.

definition: Attractive in a delicate way without being truly beautiful or handsome; to a moderately high degree; fairly.
example: She is a very pretty girl. It's pretty cold today.
koExample: 그녀는 매우 예쁜 소녀이다. 오늘 꽤 춥다.
koChirpScript: pretty. 예쁜 또는 꽤 라는 뜻입니다. She is a very pretty girl. 그녀는 매우 예쁜 소녀이다. It's pretty cold today. 오늘 꽤 춥다.

definition: The amount of money expected, required, or given in payment for something.
example: What is the price of this dress?
koChirpScript: price. 가격 이라는 뜻입니다. What is the price of this dress? 이 드레스의 가격은 얼마인가요?

definition: Almost certainly; as far as one knows or can tell.
example: I'll probably be home late tonight.
koExample: 나는 아마 오늘 밤 늦게 집에 갈 것이다.
koChirpScript: probably. 아마도 라는 뜻입니다. I'll probably be home late tonight. 나는 아마 오늘 밤 늦게 집에 갈 것이다.

definition: A matter or situation regarded as unwelcome or harmful and needing to be dealt with and overcome.
example: I have a problem with my computer.
koChirpScript: problem. 문제 라는 뜻입니다. I have a problem with my computer. 내 컴퓨터에 문제가 있다.

definition: An article or substance that is manufactured or refined for sale.
example: This is a new product.
koChirpScript: product. 제품 또는 상품 이라는 뜻입니다. This is a new product. 이것은 신제품이다.

definition: A planned series of future events or performances.
example: What's your favorite TV program?
koChirpScript: program. 프로그램 이라는 뜻입니다. What's your favorite TV program? 가장 좋아하는 TV 프로그램은 무엇인가요?

definition: An individual or collaborative enterprise that is carefully planned and designed to achieve a particular aim.
example: We are working on a new project.
koChirpScript: project. 프로젝트 또는 과제 라는 뜻입니다. We are working on a new project. 우리는 새로운 프로젝트를 진행하고 있다.

definition: Of a color intermediate between red and blue.
example: Purple is my favorite color.
koChirpScript: purple. 보라색의 또는 보라색 이라는 뜻입니다. Purple is my favorite color. 보라색은 내가 가장 좋아하는 색이다.

definition: Move to or place in a particular position.
example: Please put the book on the table.
koChirpScript: put. 놓다 또는 두다 라는 뜻입니다. Please put the book on the table. 책을 테이블 위에 놓아주세요.

definition: Each of four equal or corresponding parts into which something is or can be divided.
example: It's a quarter past three.
koChirpScript: quarter. 4분의 1 또는 15분 이라는 뜻입니다. It's a quarter past three. 3시 15분이다.

definition: A sentence worded or expressed so as to elicit information.
example: Do you have any questions?
koChirpScript: question. 질문 이라는 뜻입니다. Do you have any questions? 질문 있으신가요?

definition: Moving fast or doing something in a short time.
example: Let's have a quick chat.
koChirpScript: quick. 빠른 이라는 뜻입니다. Let's have a quick chat. 잠깐 이야기 좀 하자.

definition: At a fast speed; rapidly.
example: He finished his work quickly.
koChirpScript: quickly. 빨리 라는 뜻입니다. He finished his work quickly. 그는 일을 빨리 끝냈다.

definition: Making little or no noise.
example: Please be quiet.
koChirpScript: quiet. 조용한 이라는 뜻입니다. Please be quiet. 조용히 해주세요.

definition: To the utmost or most absolute extent or degree; absolutely; completely.
example: It's quite cold today.
koChirpScript: quite. 꽤 또는 상당히 라는 뜻입니다. It's quite cold today. 오늘 꽤 춥다.

definition: The transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves of radio frequency, especially those carrying sound messages.
example: I listen to the radio in my car.
koChirpScript: radio. 라디오 라는 뜻입니다. I listen to the radio in my car. 나는 차에서 라디오를 듣는다.

definition: Moisture condensed from the atmosphere that falls visibly in separate drops; (of rain) fall.
example: I love the sound of the rain. It's starting to rain.
koExample: 나는 빗소리를 좋아한다. 비가 오기 시작한다.
koChirpScript: rain. 비 또는 비가 오다 라는 뜻입니다. I love the sound of the rain. 나는 빗소리를 좋아한다. It's starting to rain. 비가 오기 시작한다.

definition: Look at and comprehend the meaning of (written or printed matter) by mentally interpreting the characters or symbols of which it is composed.
example: I like to read books.
koChirpScript: read. 읽다 라는 뜻입니다. I like to read books. 나는 책 읽는 것을 좋아한다.

definition: A person who reads or who is fond of reading.
example: She is a fast reader.
koChirpScript: reader. 독자 라는 뜻입니다. She is a fast reader. 그녀는 책을 빨리 읽는 사람이다.

definition: The action or skill of reading written or printed matter silently or aloud.
example: Reading is my favorite hobby.
koChirpScript: reading. 독서 라는 뜻입니다. Reading is my favorite hobby. 독서는 내가 가장 좋아하는 취미이다.

definition: In a suitable state for an activity, action, or situation; fully prepared.
example: Are you ready to go?
koChirpScript: ready. 준비된 이라는 뜻입니다. Are you ready to go? 갈 준비됐니?

definition: Actually existing as a thing or occurring in fact; not imagined or supposed.
example: Is this a real diamond?
koChirpScript: real. 진짜의 또는 실제의 라는 뜻입니다. Is this a real diamond? 이것은 진짜 다이아몬드인가요?

definition: In actual fact, as opposed to what is said or imagined; in truth.
example: I'm really sorry.
koChirpScript: really. 정말로 또는 진짜로 라는 뜻입니다. I'm really sorry. 정말로 미안해요.

definition: A cause, explanation, or justification for an action or event.
example: What is the reason for your decision?
koChirpScript: reason. 이유 라는 뜻입니다. What is the reason for your decision? 당신 결정의 이유는 무엇인가요?

definition: Of a color at the end of the spectrum next to orange and opposite violet, as of blood, fire, or rubies.
example: She is wearing a red dress.
koChirpScript: red. 빨간색의 또는 빨간색 이라는 뜻입니다. She is wearing a red dress. 그녀는 빨간 드레스를 입고 있다.

definition: Make or become less tense or anxious.
example: You need to relax and take a break.
koExample: 너는 쉬면서 긴장을 좀 풀어야 해.
koChirpScript: relax. 쉬다 또는 긴장을 풀다 라는 뜻입니다. You need to relax and take a break. 너는 쉬면서 긴장을 좀 풀어야 해.

definition: Have in or be able to bring to one's mind an awareness of (someone or something that one has seen, known, or experienced in the past).
example: I can't remember his name.
koChirpScript: remember. 기억하다 라는 뜻입니다. I can't remember his name. 그의 이름이 기억나지 않는다.

definition: Say again something one has already said.
example: Can you repeat that, please?
koChirpScript: repeat. 반복하다 또는 따라 말하다 라는 뜻입니다. Can you repeat that, please? 다시 한번 말씀해 주시겠어요?

definition: An account given of a particular matter, especially in the form of an official document, after thorough investigation or consideration by an appointed person or body.
example: I have to write a report for my boss.
koExample: 나는 상사를 위해 보고서를 써야 한다.
koChirpScript: report. 보고서 라는 뜻입니다. I have to write a report for my boss. 나는 상사를 위해 보고서를 써야 한다.

definition: A place where people pay to sit and eat meals that are cooked and served on the premises.
example: Let's go to a restaurant for dinner.
koChirpScript: restaurant. 식당 또는 레스토랑 이라는 뜻입니다. Let's go to a restaurant for dinner. 저녁 먹으러 식당에 가자.

definition: A consequence, effect, or outcome of something.
example: What was the result of the exam?
koChirpScript: result. 결과 라는 뜻입니다. What was the result of the exam? 시험 결과가 어떻게 나왔나요?

definition: Come or go back to a place or person; an act of coming or going back to a place or person.
example: When will you return? I'm looking forward to your return.
koExample: 언제 돌아올 건가요? 당신의 귀환을 고대하고 있습니다.
koChirpScript: return. 돌아오다 또는 귀환 이라는 뜻입니다. When will you return? 언제 돌아올 건가요? I'm looking forward to your return. 당신의 귀환을 고대하고 있습니다.

definition: A swamp grass that is widely cultivated as a source of food, especially in Asia.
example: I eat rice every day.
koChirpScript: rice. 쌀 또는 밥 이라는 뜻입니다. I eat rice every day. 나는 매일 밥을 먹는다.

definition: Having a great deal of money or assets; wealthy.
example: He is a very rich man.
koChirpScript: rich. 부유한 또는 부자인 이라는 뜻입니다. He is a very rich man. 그는 매우 부유한 사람이다.

definition: Sit on and control the movement of (a horse, bicycle, or motorcycle), typically as a recreation or sport.
example: I can ride a bike.
koChirpScript: ride. 타다 라는 뜻입니다. I can ride a bike. 나는 자전거를 탈 수 있다.

definition: True or correct as a matter of fact.
example: That's the right answer.
koGloss: adj. 맞는, 오른쪽의; adv. 바로; n. 권리, 오른쪽
koChirpScript: right. 맞는 또는 오른쪽의 라는 뜻입니다. That's the right answer. 그것이 정답이다.

definition: A large natural stream of water flowing in a channel to the sea, a lake, or another such stream.
example: The Han River flows through Seoul.
koChirpScript: river. 강 이라는 뜻입니다. The Han River flows through Seoul. 한강은 서울을 가로질러 흐른다.

definition: A wide way leading from one place to another, especially one with a specially prepared surface which vehicles can use.
example: Be careful when you cross the road.
koChirpScript: road. 길 또는 도로 라는 뜻입니다. Be careful when you cross the road. 길을 건널 때는 조심하세요.

definition: A part or division of a building enclosed by walls, floor, and ceiling.
example: This is my room.
koChirpScript: room. 방 이라는 뜻입니다. This is my room. 이곳은 내 방이다.

definition: A sequence of actions regularly followed; a fixed program.
example: My morning routine includes exercise and breakfast.
koExample: 나의 아침 일과는 운동과 아침 식사를 포함한다.
koChirpScript: routine. 일상 또는 루틴 이라는 뜻입니다. My morning routine includes exercise and breakfast. 나의 아침 일과는 운동과 아침 식사를 포함한다.

definition: One of a set of explicit or understood regulations or principles governing conduct within a particular activity or sphere.
example: You must follow the rules.
koChirpScript: rule. 규칙 이라는 뜻입니다. You must follow the rules. 규칙을 따라야 한다.

definition: Move at a speed faster than a walk, never having both or all the feet on the ground at the same time.
example: I run in the park every morning.
koChirpScript: run. 달리다 라는 뜻입니다. I run in the park every morning. 나는 매일 아침 공원에서 달린다.

definition: Feeling or showing sorrow; unhappy.
example: She was sad to hear the news.
koChirpScript: sad. 슬픈 이라는 뜻입니다. She was sad to hear the news. 그녀는 그 소식을 듣고 슬퍼했다.

definition: A cold dish of various mixtures of raw or cooked vegetables, usually seasoned with oil, vinegar, or other dressing and sometimes accompanied by meat, fish, or other ingredients.
example: I'll have a chicken salad, please.
koChirpScript: salad. 샐러드 라는 뜻입니다. I'll have a chicken salad, please. 치킨 샐러드로 주세요.

definition: A white crystalline substance that gives seawater its characteristic taste and is used for seasoning or preserving food.
example: Could you pass the salt, please?
koChirpScript: salt. 소금 이라는 뜻입니다. Could you pass the salt, please? 소금 좀 건네주시겠어요?

definition: Identical; not different.
example: We are in the same class.
koGloss: adj. 같은; pron. 같은 것; adv. 똑같이
koChirpScript: same. 같은 이라는 뜻입니다. We are in the same class. 우리는 같은 반이다.

definition: An item of food consisting of two pieces of bread with meat, cheese, or other filling between them, eaten as a light meal.
example: I'm having a sandwich for lunch.
koChirpScript: sandwich. 샌드위치 라는 뜻입니다. I'm having a sandwich for lunch. 나는 점심으로 샌드위치를 먹을 것이다.

definition: The day of the week before Sunday and following Friday.
example: What are you doing on Saturday?
koChirpScript: Saturday. 토요일 이라는 뜻입니다. What are you doing on Saturday? 토요일에 뭐 하니?

definition: Utter words so as to convey information, an opinion, a feeling or intention, or a question.
example: What did you say?
koChirpScript: say. 말하다 라는 뜻입니다. What did you say? 무슨 말을 했니?

definition: An institution for educating children.
example: I go to school by bus.
koChirpScript: school. 학교 라는 뜻입니다. I go to school by bus. 나는 버스를 타고 학교에 간다.

definition: The intellectual and practical activity encompassing the systematic study of the structure and behavior of the physical and natural world through observation and experiment.
example: My favorite subject is science.
koChirpScript: science. 과학 이라는 뜻입니다. My favorite subject is science. 내가 가장 좋아하는 과목은 과학이다.

definition: A person who is studying or has expert knowledge of one or more of the natural or physical sciences.
example: Marie Curie was a great scientist.
koChirpScript: scientist. 과학자 라는 뜻입니다. Marie Curie was a great scientist. 마리 퀴리는 위대한 과학자였다.

definition: Constituting number two in a sequence; 2nd.
example: This is the second time I've seen this movie.
koExample: 이 영화를 본 것은 이번이 두 번째이다.
koChirpScript: second. 두 번째의 라는 뜻입니다. This is the second time I've seen this movie. 이 영화를 본 것은 이번이 두 번째이다.

definition: The SI unit of time, the duration of 9,192,631,770 periods of the radiation corresponding to the transition between the two hyperfine levels of the ground state of the cesium 133 atom.
example: There are sixty seconds in a minute.
koChirpScript: second. '초' 라는 뜻의 시간 단위입니다. There are sixty seconds in a minute. 1분은 60초이다.

definition: Any of the more or less distinct parts into which something is or may be divided or from which it is made up.
example: This section of the book is very interesting.
koExample: 이 책의 이 부분은 매우 흥미롭다.
koChirpScript: section. 부분 또는 구역 이라는 뜻입니다. This section of the book is very interesting. 이 책의 이 부분은 매우 흥미롭다.

definition: Perceive with the eyes; discern visually.
example: I can see a bird in the tree.
koChirpScript: see. 보다 라는 뜻입니다. I can see a bird in the tree. 나무에 있는 새가 보인다.

definition: Give or hand over (something) in exchange for money.
example: They sell flowers at the market.
koChirpScript: sell. 팔다 라는 뜻입니다. They sell flowers at the market. 그들은 시장에서 꽃을 판다.

definition: Cause to go or be taken to a particular destination; arrange for the delivery of, especially by mail.
example: I'll send you an email.
koChirpScript: send. 보내다 라는 뜻입니다. I'll send you an email. 이메일을 보내겠다.

definition: A set of words that is complete in itself, typically containing a subject and predicate, conveying a statement, question, exclamation, or command, and consisting of a main clause and sometimes one or more subordinate clauses.
example: Please write a complete sentence.
koChirpScript: sentence. 문장 이라는 뜻입니다. Please write a complete sentence. 완전한 문장을 쓰세요.

definition: The ninth month of the year.
example: The new school year starts in September.
koChirpScript: September. 9월 이라는 뜻입니다. The new school year starts in September. 새 학년은 9월에 시작된다.

definition: Equivalent to the sum of three and four; one more than six; 7.
example: There are seven days in a week.
koChirpScript: seven. 숫자 7을 의미합니다. There are seven days in a week. 일주일은 7일이다.

definition: Equivalent to the sum of ten and seven; 17.
example: He is seventeen years old.
koChirpScript: seventeen. 숫자 17을 의미합니다. He is seventeen years old. 그는 17세이다.

definition: Equivalent to the product of seven and ten; 70.
example: My grandmother is seventy years old.
koChirpScript: seventy. 숫자 70을 의미합니다. My grandmother is seventy years old. 나의 할머니는 70세이시다.

definition: Have a portion of (something) with another or others.
example: Let's share the pizza.
koChirpScript: share. 공유하다 또는 나누다 라는 뜻입니다. Let's share the pizza. 피자를 나눠 먹자.

definition: Used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
example: She is my sister.
koChirpScript: she. '그녀는' 이라는 뜻의 주격 대명사입니다. She is my sister. 그녀는 나의 여동생이다.

definition: A domesticated ruminant animal with a thick woolly coat and (typically only in the male) curving horns. It is kept in flocks for its wool or meat.
example: The sheep are grazing in the field.
koChirpScript: sheep. 양 이라는 뜻입니다. 단수와 복수 형태가 같습니다. The sheep are grazing in the field. 양들이 들판에서 풀을 뜯고 있다.

definition: A garment for the upper body made of cotton or a similar fabric, with a collar and sleeves, and buttons down the front.
example: I need to iron my shirt.
koChirpScript: shirt. 셔츠 라는 뜻입니다. I need to iron my shirt. 나는 셔츠를 다려야 한다.

definition: A covering for the foot, typically made of leather, having a sturdy sole and not reaching above the ankle.
example: I bought a new pair of shoes.
koExample: 나는 새 신발 한 켤레를 샀다.
koChirpScript: shoe. 신발 이라는 뜻입니다. I bought a new pair of shoes. 나는 새 신발 한 켤레를 샀다.

definition: A building or part of a building where goods or services are sold; visit one or more stores or websites to buy goods.
example: I'm going to the shop. I like to shop for clothes.
koExample: 나는 가게에 갈 것이다. 나는 옷 쇼핑하는 것을 좋아한다.
koChirpScript: shop. 가게 또는 쇼핑하다 라는 뜻입니다. I'm going to the shop. 나는 가게에 갈 것이다. I like to shop for clothes. 나는 옷 쇼핑하는 것을 좋아한다.

definition: The action or activity of buying goods from stores.
example: Let's go shopping.
koChirpScript: shopping. 쇼핑 이라는 뜻입니다. Let's go shopping. 쇼핑하러 가자.

definition: Measuring a small distance from end to end.
example: She has short hair.
koChirpScript: short. 짧은 이라는 뜻입니다. She has short hair. 그녀는 머리가 짧다.

definition: Used to indicate obligation, duty, or correctness, typically when criticizing someone's actions.
example: You should eat more vegetables.
koExample: 너는 채소를 더 많이 먹어야 한다.
koChirpScript: should. 무엇무엇해야 한다 라는 뜻으로, 충고나 제안을 할 때 씁니다. You should eat more vegetables. 너는 채소를 더 많이 먹어야 한다.

definition: Allow or cause to be visible; a spectacle or display of something, typically an impressive one.
example: Can you show me the way? The show was amazing.
koExample: 길 좀 알려주시겠어요? 그 공연은 정말 멋졌다.
koChirpScript: show. 보여주다 또는 쇼, 공연 이라는 뜻입니다. Can you show me the way? 길 좀 알려주시겠어요? The show was amazing. 그 공연은 정말 멋졌다.

definition: A cubicle or bath in which a person stands under a spray of water to wash.
example: I'm going to take a shower.
koChirpScript: shower. 샤워 라는 뜻입니다. I'm going to take a shower. 나는 샤워하러 갈 것이다.

definition: Affected by physical or mental illness.
example: I feel sick.
koChirpScript: sick. 아픈 이라는 뜻입니다. I feel sick. 몸이 아프다.

definition: Resembling without being identical.
example: We have similar tastes in music.
koChirpScript: similar. 비슷한 이라는 뜻입니다. We have similar tastes in music. 우리는 음악 취향이 비슷하다.

definition: Make musical sounds with the voice, especially words with a set tune.
example: She likes to sing in the shower.
koChirpScript: sing. 노래하다 라는 뜻입니다. She likes to sing in the shower. 그녀는 샤워하면서 노래하는 것을 좋아한다.

definition: A person who sings, especially professionally.
example: He is a famous singer.
koChirpScript: singer. 가수 라는 뜻입니다. He is a famous singer. 그는 유명한 가수이다.

definition: A woman or girl who has one or both parents in common with another person.
example: My sister is a doctor.
koChirpScript: sister. 자매, 누나, 언니, 또는 여동생 이라는 뜻입니다. My sister is a doctor. 나의 언니는 의사이다.

definition: Adopt or be in a position in which one's weight is supported by one's buttocks rather than one's feet and one's back is upright.
example: Please sit down.
koChirpScript: sit. 앉다 라는 뜻입니다. Please sit down. 앉으세요.

definition: A set of circumstances in which one finds oneself; a state of affairs.
example: This is a difficult situation.
koChirpScript: situation. 상황 이라는 뜻입니다. This is a difficult situation. 이것은 어려운 상황이다.

definition: Equivalent to the product of two and three; one more than five, or four less than ten; 6.
example: I have six books.
koChirpScript: six. 숫자 6을 의미합니다. I have six books. 나는 책이 여섯 권 있다.

definition: Equivalent to the sum of ten and six; 16.
example: She is sixteen years old.
koChirpScript: sixteen. 숫자 16을 의미합니다. She is sixteen years old. 그녀는 16세이다.

definition: Equivalent to the product of six and ten; 60.
example: There are sixty minutes in an hour.
koChirpScript: sixty. 숫자 60을 의미합니다. There are sixty minutes in an hour. 한 시간은 60분이다.

definition: The ability to do something well; expertise.
example: He has excellent communication skills.
koExample: 그는 뛰어난 의사소통 기술을 가지고 있다.
koChirpScript: skill. 기술 또는 실력 이라는 뜻입니다. He has excellent communication skills. 그는 뛰어난 의사소통 기술을 가지고 있다.

definition: A woman's outer garment fastened around the waist and hanging down around the legs.
example: She is wearing a long skirt.
koChirpScript: skirt. 치마 라는 뜻입니다. She is wearing a long skirt. 그녀는 긴 치마를 입고 있다.
